attributes.action: Ban Estate and Letting Agent Signs
attributes.additional_details: For sale, to let, sold. These were useful when walking the streets was a common way to search for places to live. Now, most of us do this on the internet so only the Estate Agents gain anything from this practice. These signs are ugly, unsafe and a waste of trees. Blocks of flats often have signs permanently outside. They ruin the landscape. And now, Estate Agents put them up wherever they feel like, advertising local events. It's time to stop this outdated advertising method.
